entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Suffield

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
